basicHLVLPackage

Interface IhlvlBasicFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HlvlBasicFactory

    public interface IhlvlBasicFactory
    Interface declaring the methods that must be implemented form parsing a variability model to a model in the basic dialect of HLVL (Hlvl(basic))
    Author:
    Angela Villota Coffee V1 January 2019

    • Method Summary

        java.lang.String getCore(java.lang.String element)
        Produces a core relation
        Parameters:
        element, - is a String for the identifiers of the element
        Returns:
        a String with the hlvl sentences in the form coreElements(E1)

      • getCoreList

        java.lang.String getCoreList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> identifiers)
        Produces a core relation for the elements that must be included in the product.
        Parameters:
        identifiers, - is a list of the identifiers of the elements that
        Returns:
        a String with the hlvl sentences in the form coreElements(E1, E2, E3)

      • getImplies

        java.lang.String getImplies(java.lang.String left,
                            java.lang.String right)
        Produces an implies declaration of the form left => right
        Parameters:
        left, - the identifier of the left
        right, - the identifier in the right side of the implication
        Returns:
        an hlvl sentence in the form implies(left, right)

      • getMutex

        java.lang.String getMutex(java.lang.String left,
                          java.lang.String right)
        Produces a mutex declaration for two elements that can't be included in a product at the same time
        Parameters:
        left, - the identifier of the left
        right, - the identifier in the right side of the implication
        Returns:
        an hlvl sentence in the form mutex(left, right)

      • getDecomposition

        java.lang.String getDecomposition(java.lang.String parent,
                                  java.lang.String child,
                                  DecompositionType type)
        Parameters:
        parent - id of the parent
        child - is an identifier
        type - can be Mandatory or Optional, the decomposition types supported by HLVL(basic)
        Returns:
        an hlvl sentence in the form decomposition(parent, [c1])< card>

      • getDecompositionList

        java.lang.String getDecompositionList(java.lang.String parent,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> children,
                                      DecompositionType type)
        Parameters:
        parent - id of the parent
        children - list of the cildren's identifiers
        type - can be Mandatory or Optional, the decomposition types supported by HLVL(basic)
        Returns:
        an hlvl sentence in the form decomposition(parent, [c1, c2, ..cn])< card>

      • getGroup

        java.lang.String getGroup(java.lang.String parent,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> children,
                          GroupType type)
        Parameters:
        parent - id of the parent
        children - list of the cildren's identifiers
        type - can be Alternative and Or, the group types supported by HLVL(basic)
        Returns:
        an hlvl sentence in the form group(parent, [c1, c2, ..cn])[min, max]
